description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
40294 - Tracing Precedents and Dependents
 
Enhancements
40338 - Saving workbook in XLSX is throwing error
40351 - AutoFitColumn options
19106 - Is there GetDependents() method in the .NET version
40356 - Support TH elements in the HTML Table
40156 - Excel to PDF (Arabic) - Incorrect word/date formatting on conversion
40280 - Antivirus software strips out Excel files from emails
 
Exceptions
40334 - Error while opening a file which has one worksheet with name containing: “!” character
40141 - Exceptions on loading valid Excel file - every time
40355 - Range of AutoFilter is not valid
40290 - Exception after using Combine() and Save() methods for workbooks with external references
 
Bugs
40296 - Conditional Formatting issue as of the version v4.8.1
40289 - Button properties
40308 - Cells with Feet and Inches are incorrect when converted to PDF
40309 - Problem rendering em dash characters in PDF output  
40144 - Page Layout changed in the Merged workbook
40336 - Save as XLSX sometimes produces an invalid file  
40327 - XLS file opens in Protected mode after using Aspose.Cells
40350 - Cell.GetDependents() doesn't work with NamedRange
40340 - AutoFitRow and IndentLevel issue
40359 - Problem with named range when using Combine operation
40298 - TickLabels are not visible when the no. of Ticklabels’ count is larger
40358 - Problems translating MS Excel charts to PDF, Y-Axis missing
40293 - Issues with Line width in Graphics and blank text areas
40302 - Issue with ADDRESS, COUNTBLANK, and IF Functions
40320 - VLOOKUP AND OFFSET FUNCTIONS Issues
40315 - No MS Excel Formula Validation
40346 - Problems with NETWORKDAYS function in XLS output
40183 - HTML-to-Excel Conversion Issues
40361 - HTML’s rowspan and class attributes issues
40357 - Does Cells support datauri
40349 - Custom formatted borders lost when converting to PDF
40332 - Gridlines in PDF Export
40300 - Excel Found Unreadable Content error
40331 - Extract the custom pivot style out from the template file
40300 - Issue found in MS Excel: “Excel Found Unreadable Content…”
40323 - Column alignment in image when using SheetRender API
40339 - Excel rendering issue
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
